Summary: a bright glowing "bar" hovering, no sound, then shot off at lightening speed
divs: sighting detailssept. 2012, cloudy night, went out on my deck to smoke, the bright light caught my eye, a glowing "bar" or edge of something. in seconds it took off leaving a light trail that lasted a second or two. no sound at all. i kept questioning what i saw. everyone i mentioned it to just laughed. i know what i saw. the light trail was not a single line. that's why i thought it might have some dimension to it that wasn't visible because the sky was so overcast. it shot off over my row of townhomes without a sound in a north\northeast direction.
